QuestData.Title: Hands Off My Booty!
QuestData.Description:
We are dealing with lawless, no-account thugs. As soon as they gained ground, they started looting! Looting right in the middle of a battle!
Well I, for one, am not giving up our booty that easily.
Get up to the top of Vigil Hill and man the main cannon. Rain hellfire down on those blaggards!
Dismissed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Man the Vigil Hill Cannon and use it to slay $1oa looters.
QuestData.CompletionText: What are you waiting for? Get up there and man that cannon!
QuestData.RewardText: They destroyed the main gun?!$B$BThen it's time to advance on foot!
